description.value: You gain proficiency with scythes. Whenever you cast the @Compendium[undertaking-homebrew.spells-cantrips.QVIXYJFEAOXHF2SW]{Dread Blade} cantrip you can create a scythe with a damage die of 1d8 necrotic and the added trait Reach.

system.requirements: 3rd level overall and have at least one level each in a Martial and Spellcaster class
